name: Rooftop Runner (SONITKP)
description:
Rooftop Runner

A hyper-casual game made for the Hyper Casual Jam in a couple days.

On phone: Touch on the left of the screen to jump, and on the right to attack.
On browser: Z to jump, X to attack.

At score 600 a dragon spawns. It is the only boss of the game with 5 hit points.

Song: SwitchBlade by Jallacy

If you can't use keyboard controls, refresh the page.
